That's how I started singing.

If I sing, my family will pay attention

I sang songs that were popular at that

When I was young, I wanted to be a

I was praised a lot.

I was able to get attention by

Yes, yes.

City,

I didn't even use an interface.

I was recording.

Yes.
I was told that I would be fired.
Oh, really?

Yes. I was told that I would be a civil

I would go to college and become a civil

That's right.

I'm really sorry, but I'm not going to

It's different.

That's how I see it.

I've been singing as a means.
What's important is to express yourself.

If I refer to someone else, I can't

I don't listen to specific people, and I

That's why I'm able to cover vocalists.

I can't do it for a person who's not a

It's difficult.

I was able to learn new expressions,
like,
I'm a little better at this.

this year.

I want you to enjoy your music as clean

When did you decide to wear a mask?

I kept refusing to do it.

I thought I would definitely get a good

I was really resisting. I didn't want to

I really wanted to hear only the song.

I thought I'd try it once.

So, how do you show yourself on the

I was thinking of putting on a mask

Did you have any particular thoughts

I was originally going for a full face.
You look like Daft Punk.

It's like when you come to know the
vocals,

your singing doesn't help get in your

That's what I decided.

So, the designer asked me to develop my

I was pretty depressed at that time.

Singing and my individuality.
